this movie is an adaptation of George Bernard Shaw's "Pygmalion". The movie was very helpful and brought to life the characters and the scenes while i was studding the novel in our literature class.

Not a great download. The aspect ratio should be wider, so the characters look slightly narrower. You should probably just download the HD one.
